page.title: 08SCHOOLS IN ABERDOUR AREA
page.content: There is really only one primary school in our area,{Aberdour Primary. We are also including our school {Dalgety Bay Primary}which is just outside our area.{Aberdour Primary}has a total of{155}pupils,with{7}teachers and seven primaries.There are also two composite classes.The school was built in{1967.}Our school{Dalgety Bay {Primary}has{520}pupils including{96}in the nursery class.We have{20}teachers with two composite classes.Our school was built in{1969. Hillside Private {School}which is the other school in our area, has{40}pupils with{9 teachers.This school was founded in {1960}but changed its status in {1983.}They are still adding to it in {1985.}It has{2}composite classes and is a school for maladjusted boys.This school was privatised{2 years}ago.
